channel.title: admin on Martin J. Menten
channel.description: Recent content in admin on Martin J. Menten

item.description: I am a postdoctoral research fellow at the Institute of Cancer Research in London researching real-time adaptive radiotherapy in the group of Professor Uwe Oelfke. I recently obtained my PhD in medical physics from the ICR. Before that, I studied physics at Heidelberg University, Germany, while completing research projects at the German Cancer Research Center and University of Wisconsin-Madison, USA. Radiotherapy treats cancer by targeted exposure of tumors to ionizing radiation.
